column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////On a positive note
column2: my boyfriend really enjoyed his chocolate chip cookie. It was ranked as one of his top 10 chocolate chip cookies. Additionally
column3: we arrived around 11 am and there was a small line that did go slightly out of the door
column5: the line went quickly. Also the environment was aesthetically pleasing because of all of the open windows
column6: but I did not appreciate how crowded the tables were next to each other. Too close for my comfort.
